TopicTitle: They need to Move Kerbin City further away from the Marines...

Articles.Content:
LOL!

http://i1377.photobucket.com/albums/ah65/CorperalVasquez/screenshot279_zps50f3e8c3.png' alt='screenshot279_zps50f3e8c3.png'>

Ok, here's the story, After a long week of training, and training, and virtually no sleep, a few of the Boys from the 8th BMTS went to Kerbin city. After many rounds and bragging, they showed up on base with what appears to be a Kerbin City Poilce Car. its affectionatly dubbed, TEST CAR 2.....

Ok, to finish this tale,

After the drunken marines liberated the Kerbin city Police car, and dumped it on the KSC, the Kerbs in charge decided that they to could benefit from some cruisers.

http://i1377.photobucket.com/albums/ah65/CorperalVasquez/screenshot281_zpsc015a480.png' alt='screenshot281_zpsc015a480.png'>

The new model Kords are in and the KSC has a growing fleet. Much slower than the city versions, but still effective in deteriing drunk marines from depositing ill gotten gains all over the facility. LOL
I know this is old and dead, but do you have a link to this mod or can you tell me what it is and/or distribute it to me?
